SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN preReceiving = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pRequallZeroCount, SUM(CASE WHEN preReceiving = 0 THEN sellPrice ELSE 0 END) AS sellSumPceZero, SUM(CASE WHEN preReceiving = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pRequallOneCount, SUM(CASE WHEN preReceiving = 1 THEN sellPrice ELSE 0 END) AS sellSumPceOne FROM SELL_TABLE WHERE YEAR(sellDate) = #{yearData} AND MONTH(sellDate) = #{monthData};
SELECT SUM(purchasePrice) AS SumPurchaseByMonth FROM PURCHASE_TABLE WHERE YEAR(purchaseDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AND MONTH(purchaseDate) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE());
SELECT SUM(sellPrice) AS SumSellByMonth FROM SELL_TABLE WHERE YEAR(sellDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AND MONTH(sellDate) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE());

SELECT SUM(ResultTotal) AS TotalResult FROM (SELECT (sellEaprice * sellQuantity) AS MutipleSellPrice, (purchaseEaprice * sellQuantity) AS MutiplePurchasePrice, ((sellEaprice * sellQuantity) - (purchaseEaprice * sellQuantity)) AS ResultTotal FROM SELL_TABLE JOIN PURCHASE_TABLE ON SELL_TABLE.purchasePDTNUM = PURCHASE_TABLE.purchasePDTNUM WHERE YEAR(sellDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AND MONTH(sellDate) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE())) AS SubQuery;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalPreReciving FROM SELL_TABLE WHERE preReceiving = 1 AND MONTH(sellDate) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AND YEAR(sellDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE());

SELECT SUM(IF(MONTH(purchaseDate) = 1, 1, 0)) AS PurchaseTotalByJan, SUM(IF(MONTH(purchaseDate) = 2, 1, 0)) AS PurchaseTotalByFeb, SUM(IF(MONTH(purchaseDate) = 3, 1, 0)) AS PurchaseTotalByMar, SUM(IF(MONTH(purchaseDate) = 4, 1, 0)) AS PurchaseTotalByApr, SUM(IF(MONTH(purchaseDate) = 5, 1, 0)) AS PurchaseTotalByMay, SUM(IF(MONTH(purchaseDate) = 6, 1, 0)) AS PurchaseTotalByJun, SUM(IF(MONTH(purchaseDate) = 7, 1, 0)) AS PurchaseTotalByJul, SUM(IF(MONTH(purchaseDate) = 8, 1, 0)) AS PurchaseTotalByAug, SUM(IF(MONTH(purchaseDate) = 9, 1, 0)) AS PurchaseTotalBySep, SUM(IF(MONTH(purchaseDate) = 10, 1, 0)) AS PurchaseTotalByOct, SUM(IF(MONTH(purchaseDate) = 11, 1, 0)) AS PurchaseTotalByNov, SUM(IF(MONTH(purchaseDate) = 12, 1, 0)) AS PurchaseTotalByDec FROM PURCHASE_TABLE;

SELECT SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 1, 1, 0)) AS SellTotalByJan, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 2, 1, 0)) AS SellTotalByFeb, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 3, 1, 0)) AS SellTotalByMar, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 4, 1, 0)) AS SellTotalByApr, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 5, 1, 0)) AS SellTotalByMay, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 6, 1, 0)) AS SellTotalByJun, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 7, 1, 0)) AS SellTotalByJul, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 8, 1, 0)) AS SellTotalByAug, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 9, 1, 0)) AS SellTotalBySep, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 10, 1, 0)) AS SellTotalByOct, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 11, 1, 0)) AS SellTotalByNov, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 12, 1, 0)) AS SellTotalByDec FROM SELL_TABLE;

SELECT SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 1 AND preReceiving = 1, 1, 0)) AS PreTotalByJan, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 2 AND preReceiving = 1, 1, 0)) AS PreTotalByFeb, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 3 AND preReceiving = 1, 1, 0)) AS PreTotalByMar, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 4 AND preReceiving = 1, 1, 0)) AS PreTotalByApr, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 5 AND preReceiving = 1, 1, 0)) AS PreTotalByMay, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 6 AND preReceiving = 1, 1, 0)) AS PreTotalByJun, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 7 AND preReceiving = 1, 1, 0)) AS PreTotalByJul, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 8 AND preReceiving = 1, 1, 0)) AS PreTotalByAug, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 9 AND preReceiving = 1, 1, 0)) AS PreTotalBySep, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 10 AND preReceiving = 1, 1, 0)) AS PreTotalByOct, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 11 AND preReceiving = 1, 1, 0)) AS PreTotalByNov, SUM(IF(MONTH(sellDate) = 12 AND preReceiving = 1, 1, 0)) AS PreTotalByDec FROM SELL_TABLE;
